title: Projected increase of the national defense budget in Canada fiscal years 2018 to 2027
yAxis: Annual funding increase in million Canadian dollars
summary: Overall Annual funding increase in million Canadian dollars has increased over the Year.
Annual funding increase in million Canadian dollars is slightly increasing from 2019-2020 to 2021-2022.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2020-2021 and 2021-2022.
Maximum Annual funding increase in million Canadian dollars, about 1016.0 was reported at Year 2021-2022
Minimum Annual funding increase in million Canadian dollars about 580.0 was reached at Year 2019-2020
